# 知乎问答：没有导师的指导，研究生如何阅读文献、提出创见、写论文？

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/zhihu-wenda-meiyou-daoshi-de-zhidao-yanjiusheng-ruhe-yuedu-wenxian-tichu-chuangjian-xie-lunwen
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/zhihu-wenda-meiyou-daoshi-de-zhidao-yanjiusheng-ruhe-yuedu-wenxian-tichu-chuangjian-xie-lunwen
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install zhihu-wenda-meiyou-daoshi-de-zhidao-yanjiusheng-ruhe-yuedu-wenxian-tichu-chuangjian-xie-lunwen
zhihu-wenda-meiyou-daoshi-de-zhidao-yanjiusheng-ruhe-yuedu-wenxian-tichu-chuangjian-xie-lunwen <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g zhihu-wenda-meiyou-daoshi-de-zhidao-yanjiusheng-ruhe-yuedu-wenxian-tichu-chuangjian-xie-lunwen
zhihu-wenda-meiyou-daoshi-de-zhidao-yanjiusheng-ruhe-yuedu-wenxian-tichu-chuangjian-xie-lunwen <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
